title: For sale:  1928 Block Brothers Postcard (Richard Merkin collection)
author: docpatlv

posts.post_title: For sale:  1928 Block Brothers Postcard (Richard Merkin collection)
posts.post_content:
For sale:  1928 Block Brothers postcard - St. Louis Cardinals

From the Richard Merkin collection. This postcard features 7 HOFers including Alexander, Bottomley, Frisch, Maranville, Hafey, Haines and McKechnie.  See photos for condition.  

Price:  $ SOLD shipped via PayPal family/friends
